#summary Plugin to broadcast kill info

=== Table of Contents ===
<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= Introduction =
 * this is a plugin that broadcasts info about a mob kill

= Help =
 {{{
/*
[FOR PLUGIN AUTHORS ONLY]

Broadcasts when a mob is killed
Broadcasts
   1 - mob killed
       kill_info = {mob = mobname, xp = xp, bonusxp = bonusxp, gold = gold

Example
  function OnPluginBroadcast (msg, id, name, text)
    if id == "37a61c4570508448e19c7c14" and msg == 1 then
      local pvar = GetPluginVariable(  "37a61c4570508448e19c7c14", "kill_info")

      -- get the mobs
      loadstring( pvar )()
      kill = kill_info
    end
  end
*/
 }}}


= Installation ==
 * Required 
  * [pluginhelper] and its dependencies
  * Nick's [http://www.gammon.com.au/forum/?id=8776 Stats_Detector.xml] Plugin in the directory <Mushclient Install Dir>\worlds\plugins\Aardwolf (included in the Aardwolf Mushclient)
 * download from stable [http://code.google.com/p/bastmush/source/browse/branches/stable/worlds/plugins/Aardwolf/broadcast_kills.xml here] (make a note of the revision, it will help troubleshoot) or checkout with subversion and copy into the directory <Mushclient Install Dir>\worlds\plugins\Aardwolf

= Troubleshooting =
 * run the command "bkill set tdebug true" to enable debugging
